Summary: Ameren (AEE) analyzed 1 bill with 6 direct impacts. Key regulatory impact: 75% increase. No indirect risks. Overall direct risk: -1.0, indicating low legislative threat exposure.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes regulation. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "This section shall not apply to any wind energy component produced and sold after December 31, 2027."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes regulation. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "This section shall not apply to any metallurgical coal produced after December 31, 2029."
